snippet.title: Methods: The Detective Competition Trailer
snippet.description:
Methods: The Detective Competition has finally come to mobile! Get it here!

App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/methods-detective-competition/id6467845950?platform=iphone 
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.erabit.methods.tdc1.paid.gp

One hundred detectives compete against each other in a mysterious competition, solving mysteries created by criminal masterminds.

The detective who wins receives one million dollars and the opportunity of a lifetime. If a criminal wins, however, they will also receive a million dollars... and parole, no matter the severity of their crime.

https://www.lockedongames.com/methods
